title: What is this song, playing in the background? - Quora

response.answer_text: My question to you is, are you the person (or associated with the person) who is presenting their theory in the video for why Linux is better than Windows Core OS? The music sounds like a light, light version of an instrumental of some 70’s bands like Earth Wind and Fire, or Ramsey Lewis (an elevator music version of it). The music is so light in the background it’s barely audible. If I’m wrong, I apologize, but I think you just wanted to lead people to your pitch about the death of Windows.
Sounds like a bunch of royalty-free stock soundtrack clips.
I don’t know??? lol, do i look like google
